Type.Name: XsltContext

TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XsltContext extends System.Xml.XmlNamespaceManager

Type.ThreadSafetyStatement: All the dynamic members are not designed to be thread safe.

Docs.summary: The context in which an XPath expression is evaluated.
Docs.remarks: This class allows custom XPath functions and variables to declared and used inside XPath expressions.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Creates a new XsltContext with a new NameTable.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Xml.NameTable table) cil managed

Docs.param: To be added: an object of type 'System.Xml.NameTable'
Docs.summary: Creates a new XsltContext with the given NameTable.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract int CompareDocument (string baseUri, string nextbaseUri);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance int32 CompareDocument(string baseUri, string nextbaseUri) cil managed

Docs.summary: Determines if two documents are the same, based on URI string.
Docs.returns: If they are equal, then 0; otherwise, compare two URI strings as string.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool PreserveWhitespace(class System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator node) cil managed

Docs.param: A instance whose current node is determined to have whitespaces or not.
Docs.summary: Determines if the parameter node's whitespace should be preserved or not.
Docs.returns: True if whitespaces should be preserved; otherwise False.
Docs.remarks: The return value comes from the nearest ancestor's preserve-whitespace or strip-whitespace attribute value.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction ResolveFunction (string prefix, string name, System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType[] ArgTypes);

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextFunction ResolveFunction(string prefix, string name, valuetype System.Xml.XPath.XPathResultType[] ArgTypes) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that is resolved to a namespace string that consists of the function's name.
A string that represents local part of the name.
Docs.summary: Resolves a function that is in current context and that is identified by the name and argument types.
Docs.returns: An instance of that represents the matching function, or null if no proper function was found.

MemberSignature.Value: public abstract System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable ResolveVariable (string prefix, string name);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Xml.Xsl.IXsltContextVariable ResolveVariable(string prefix, string name) cil managed

Docs.param: A string that is resolved to a namespace string that consists of the variable's name.
A string that represents local part of the name.
Docs.summary: Resolves a variable that is in current context and that is identified by the name.
Docs.returns: An instance of that represents the matching variable, or null if no proper variable was found.

Docs.summary: Represents the current whitespace preservation from current context.
